website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. Offers enough power, performance, and versatility to get you through 90% of the cutting jobs that you will likely ever do.
pros: Incredibly easy to operate - even for beginners and those unfamiliar with power tools like jigsaws
cons: Lacks some of the bells and whistles of the Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Buy the T-shank blades only - Don’t be tempted to purchase the U-shank blades with this item!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this saw for a few years, and have used it without any problems until today (5/20/18). The saw comes with a T-shank blade for wood which is great. Now...what you don’t want to do is purchase any U-shank blades for this saw, because eventually the keyless bladelock mechanism will lose some of its spring-tension, rendering that multipack of B&D U-shank blades useless, especially the metal cutting blades. The bladelock mechanism will actually lock the T-shanks blades in places, while the U-shank blades are only held in place by the tension - they never really lock into place.
customer_reviews.author: borborygmus

customer_reviews.title: Great Jig Saw!
customer_reviews.text: I am a person who does my research before purchasing items like this. This Jig Saw is fantastic!! I love it! It handles so so well, smooth cuts. its great for the work I do. I highly recommend purchasing Black + Decker for your next Jig Saw
customer_reviews.author: dillon peters

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to get the right blades
customer_reviews.text: Works great, powerful and easy to use. Important note! I followed the advice of others and bought blades that are different from what Amazon recommends. They fit perfectly. Bosch T5002 10-Piece Assorted T-Shank Jig Saw Blade Set
customer_reviews.author: Timchenko

customer_reviews.title: I am a female with no experience with saws, ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a female with no experience with saws, and I was able to set this up and safely use with no problem! I have only cut a few 2x4's for practice, but it cuts smoothly and without any problems. cant wait to get started on bigger projects.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for a pool deck build.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make trim cuts on a pool deck. I made several cuts with the included blade. Worked perfectly. Cut through wet, pressure treated, 5/4 decking without issue. Also used it to finish cuts on stair stringers. No problem cutting 1 1/2" material either. Completed project all with the included blade.
customer_reviews.author: Reed.B.

customer_reviews.title: Saw is great. Delivery disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jigsaw and it got delivered as scheduled. What I am not happy about is the fact that it says on my order that "the package was handed directly to a resident." It was not handed to me, but left on my front step. That part is fine. But there was no outer packaging, so anyone walking or driving by knew exactly what was in the box. It would have been easy for anyone to spot the package, see that it was a Black and Decker Jigsaw and run up and grab it. I've ordered many things from Amazon, but this is the first time that there was no added packaging to disguise the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Teacart

customer_reviews.title: This is not a safe tool to use.
customer_reviews.text: First, there is no trigger lock. This matters because when you either pick up or set the tool down, you have to either use two hands, or risk accidentally activating it with your index finger. Second, the adjustment plate is held in place with a screw that will vibrate loose over time. You MUST check this periodically, or you risk losing control of the tool if the plate gets loose and you pull backward. Third, it pulls HARD to the left. The trigger action is nice; the motor is strong; it is in other regards acceptable. However, I would not recommend this jigsaw for any shop.
customer_reviews.author: naptastic

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm pleased with the purchase. I've used it a few times for straight cuts, to trim down cabinet skins and cabinet scribe (molding). It's not a clean cut like a miter saw (edges that are showing need to be sanded a bit), but I prefer using it over the miter (for the scribe that could be cut with either saw) because it's so lightweight and portable and the blade is so much smaller. I've only had it a few weeks, so I can't comment on its longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: jdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Deserves Negative Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the quality of this thing absolute garbage but the blade doesn't even sit right in the chuck. The chuck let go of the blade half way through my cut and nearly cut my finger off. I would NEVER EVER trust this brand again in my life. Clearly just absolute Chinese Garbage and saving $20 on a jigsaw for a $10,000 medical bill is NOT worth it, especially when I have one less finger out of the deal. NEVER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Saving a few dollars buying this junk us not worth it if you end up throwing it in the trash. Everything is coming apart on this saw. The cotter pin holding the guide wheel popped off right away leaving no replacement and unable to complete the job. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Feels very durable. Great price, cheaper then at hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is very good machine and good price, quality and strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Black & Decker Blades
customer_reviews.text: It appears you needSet NOT the one listed. The free blade that comes with this jig saw marked 90625338 "Speed Wood" I can not find from Black & Decker butThe saw is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rickaren

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Failed the first time used, half way thru an 8" circle in plywood
customer_reviews.author: alimoguy

customer_reviews.title: Scottish Highland Games
customer_reviews.text: This thing throws blades like like a guy competing at the hammer toss. Be careful! Whilst using, please make sure no one else is anywhere near the saw, and be sure to wear personal protective equipment... like protective goggles, cup, long sleeves. It WILL kick out the blade from the saw.
customer_reviews.author: Precision Northwest

customer_reviews.title: love black and decker
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diy guy. I've been an actual handy man for a living. For home projects, this thing is tops. It's rather light, easy to use, easy to modify for beveled cuts and so on. I would not recommend this for a construction company that spends 12 plus hours a day building house after house, but for an "around the home" power tool, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Damn thing doesn't have safety trigger button
customer_reviews.text: Very unsafe around kids ! There is no safety trigger button or lock button , just one single push button. Totally not recommended ! All my other carpentry tools have it Skil , Worx etc have this for circular and other types of saws. Poor and unsafe design by Black and Decker
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive tool for DIY
customer_reviews.text: I am adding faux shiplap to my kitchen walls and needed the jigsaw to cut around electric boxes. This works great and is easy to operate, even for a complete DIY newbie. I'm grateful that I had already purchased clamps to hold my cabinets together - they are necessary, obviously, I guess. I also purchased a package of different blades, but the blade that came with the saw is working very well with the 1/2 inch plywood I'm cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and so do I. It's very convenient to have a handy, easy to use quality saw for small jobs that need to be done. We have a few Black and Decker appliances and they are all reliable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Great little product for doing things around the yard
customer_reviews.text: Great little product for doing things around the yard. Very comfortable in the hand, and enough power for most tasks. It has not bogged down, but I will add some load to it and see what happens. I would recommend it. Update. This saw disappointed me. The spring on one of the brushes melted completely while the other remained intact. Now deadweight. I will see what the seller says
customer_reviews.author: Billy Darroux

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my moderate needs
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've had the pleasure of using a high-end Bosch jig saw on some projects. If I were going to be consistently using a jig saw more than a few times per year, or if I needed the utmost blade stability to make very precise cuts, I would invest in one of those. But since I won't be, this saw performs better than adequately at around a tenth of the cost. It's a handy tool to have around the house for occasional cutting tasks that can't be accomplished with a circular saw or chop saw.
customer_reviews.author: boingo of the oing

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  Comfortable and Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very comfortable and easy to use. I'm using it to cut decking boards, and so far it does an outstanding job. The saw blade is held securely by the convenient quick change system and doesn't fly off. I would say the blade only loosens, as reported by some other reviewers, if it's not installed properly. Solid five stars.
customer_reviews.author: RichardL

customer_reviews.title: Good for small projects, feels like a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly anything this brand is flimsy, we bough a drill that was black and decker and it stopped holding a charge after like 3 times of charging it, this Jig Saw is like a kids toy, it did cut the wood table I was trimming but it had a lot of trouble staying straight. The black paint from the flat piece at the bottom was smeared all over the desk. I would honestly spend a little more money (if you are planning to do more projects) on a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps we purchased a dud but within 10 minutes of ...
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps we purchased a dud but within 10 minutes of using this tool, it was sparking and smoking from the motor. We were scared of electric shock with continued use and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BabyMamaBeth

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, used product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in an extremely dirty condition (see picture). The blade was already out of the torn plastic (see second picture). The package did not come with any instruction manual. Clearly this was a used returned product that someone didn’t care enough to clean and repack. I would be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nufam

customer_reviews.title: Great consumer jig saw
customer_reviews.text: Great jig saw. This replaced the old Craftsman that I had for almost 20 years. I hope this one lasts as well. It cuts much better. I don't think the visual alignment is as good as it could be - there should be a center notch on the baseplate, at least for straight cuts. It's a little heavier then I am used to but it's a bigger motor. Still, it is comfortable enough for casual use. I like the dial to adjust cutting style (straight vs. curves, by degrees)
customer_reviews.author: djb

customer_reviews.title: Powerful jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this after looking at several options in HD and Amazon. It is a very compact unit and is pretty powerful. I was able to cut a 2 X4 and metal screws. It only comes with a wood blade so you will need additional blades for metal and other surfaces, It is also quite loud but it gets the job done. You can't beat the price either. Home Depot sells the 300C model in their store for $29.95 but it only have 4.5 amp. I think 600C is a better deal with more power.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great for novice to pros!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease this jigsaw has! I burnt up my old jigsaw cutting 2 by material! I purchased this one to replace it! I am building Harley Davidson style rocking horses! This saw cut thru all my materials like a hot knife thru butter! Easy to control, exceptional power and works like a champ! I doubt I will but if I ever need to replace this jigsaw I will definitely buy another one exactly the same, if they still make it....lol It is great for the novice woodworker! I have been making wood projects for years so I am no novice! This is great for my little home projects and my rockers that I build now!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lomax

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw, been using it to build a large shed and it performs beautifully....easy to maneuver, quiet, and accurate....I am especially pleased that you can easily see your blade as it cuts the material with no strain...I own a DeWalt and a Ryobi and neither has this feature....you have to bend at an odd angle to see what your cuttin with both the other brands....now, I’m just a DIY’er Not a pro, so take that into consideration, but you won’t be disappointed for everyday semi heavy use..
customer_reviews.author: John C. Mclaurin

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this yesterday and it arrived the very next day. We needed it to cut wood for our Chicken Coop, This little baby has lot of power for a great affordable price!! My husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for $30
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on this before I purchased back in March, and have since used it many times. Works awesome. It has plenty of power, and its cuts are extremely reliable. Its a simple tool with simple settings, and really doesn't need any bells and whistles. The cutting dial does exactly what is says it does - loose cutting for curves, and rigid cutting for straight. So far, no drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This saw looked good when I got it
customer_reviews.text: This saw looked good when I got it. However, the first time I used it the pin holding the blade guide in sheared off and now I can't cut anything straight. I will be returning this and just spending more to get something better. Probably fine for some users, maybe I just got a faulty part but I needed this project done today to appease the significant other and now she's gonna be piiiiissed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sobaje

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: for the price this is a great saw. probably not as precise or heavy duty as more expensive saws but if you're not a professional carpenter or wood worker you probably wouldn't know the difference. been using this for a few months now and I've had no problems. I would definitely recommend this saw for any one who needs one. I've used it to cut every thing from rigid plank flooring, hardwood, 2x4s, ply wood, PVC, and thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Jig Saw
customer_reviews.text: Currently remodeling my kitchen. I have an old Black & Decker single speed jig saw I have had for over 25 years, it broke. I ordered this one from Amazon and five minutes after it was delivered it was laying on my garage floor, after cutting a pile of board. I have been using it for about a week now. I only wish my old jig saw would have broke at the beginning of my remodel instead of toward the end. This jig saw made life a lot easier. I hope it last as long as my other B&D jig saw.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's Not Included
customer_reviews.text: Even though the instruction talk about how to use a rip fence to guide straight lines and make circles, the rip fence is not included in the box (it is an extra). I ordered and returned the saw and ordered another before I found out that bit of information. Other than that, the saw is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: have been using it for 2 month, mostly for wood cutting. It runs smooth, had no problems. The only thing is that, it is hard to move the bottom plate for angle cuts, you have t screw it open, adjust and screw the plate back. Cutting at angles does not happen too often though. for the price, it is great
customer_reviews.author: mohamad

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank.
customer_reviews.text: Little loud and a bit heavy. The heavy part is because they built it solid so no complaint about that and this type of saw is loud so that's normal. I will take a little extra noise for more power and that's what I got. One thing they didn't put in the Ad is it has a hook up for a vacuum that's a nice plus and to set the base at a 45* angle you just back off a screw and flip it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Selling older version. New version has modified wire guard to view sawing guide
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, Received Type (1) older version. New version (2) has modified wire guard to view sawing guide. Version 1 wire guard blocked viewing the sawing guide..Returned back to Amazon. There is no way of telling what version you are buying until the box is opened...Really stupid of Black & Decker not to put some kind of notification on the box..
customer_reviews.author: mikoprod

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for the DIYer+
customer_reviews.text: I do not use a Jigsaw often, but I did lay new vinyl flooring in multiple rooms and this jigsaw was my best friend. I bought a set of Bosch blades and it cut through the flooring like butter. The adjustable dial is OK, I don't think it varies much but it is variable speed based on pressure of the trigger. For what I need, this is a great value tool and would recommend to any DIYer+
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel and rivet of the blade support popped out after very light use
customer_reviews.text: While cutting ordinary 1/2" plywood, the wheel of the blade support, and the rivet that kept it in place, somehow popped out. That was the second or third time I've used it since I purchased it, and haven't used it again since then for obvious security reasons. I've e-mailed B&D support today, and may add or subtract stars later on (and do a more thorough review), depending on how CS deals with it. It's still under warranty, after all. Gave it 3 stars since it worked fine before it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin A.

customer_reviews.title: Step up from my old unit
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old unit for the following reasons: - Blades don't need a hex key to replace - Trigger control for speed perfectly intuitive - Oscillating is easy to control with the dial - The base plate is easier to set to different angles and is a lot more precise Only issue is that the cord could have been 2 feet longer
customer_reviews.author: G. Kwon Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Hold On Tight...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to install a dog door in an interior door of my home. Knowing that a Jig Saw was the perfect tool, I ordered this one. I have never worked a Jig before so it was a bit intimidating. This little thing will get away from you if you're not careful! I would imagine that working on flat, horizontal stuff would be easier than a hollow, vertical door when it comes to being able to control this saw. With that said, it did exactly what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sadara

customer_reviews.title: A bit temperamental but workable.
customer_reviews.text: I had to dock a star from each category because this saw, while easy to figure out, is a bit temperamental to use. It has a real kick to it and tends to fight you when making turns. It's not awful but expect a lot of vibrating and noise as well. Other than that, I'm really happy with it. The cons are workable once you know what they are.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveling Cats Tour

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this Jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: It runs very smooth. All jigsaws make that mechanical sound, but this one's not objectionable at all. The speed varies from a very slow crawl, to a good pace. I'm impressed. The vibration feels like it's being counter-weighted. It feels good in the hand; very solid and with reasonable heft. Blade changes require no tools; what an improvement! There is a spring-loaded lever that you push upward, and then you insert the saw blade in, and then let go of the lever. How can you go wrong for thirty bucks?
customer_reviews.author: kkrome25

customer_reviews.title: A good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty easy to handle corded jigsaw. It is easy to use, and you can change blades quickly. It’s pretty maneuverable, but it’s a little tricky on small radius cuts. Make sure you have the right blade. To follow a line accurately, you have to get right down on top of it. Remember to wear your goggles. All in all, a good tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Kurlinkus

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Used it to cut out metal/wood interior door. It worked great! Took a min. To start the cut then it went through like better! This thing is a good size, good weight, looks solid! Pretty happy with it! If it fails or something i will update the review. But i dont see that happening.
customer_reviews.author: mitsuevors

customer_reviews.title: Worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: I’m just a house hold handy man that also does a few projects occasionally. Never used a jig saw before so I cantdirectly compare it to another. Buy I have used a saws all when a jig saw would be better. This worked great on my past two projects. For the occasional use at home this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but felt I could confidently and easily use it basically after a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints. I took it out and began working. I have never used one of these machines before, but felt I could confidently and easily use it basically after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mystiviolet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for small project
customer_reviews.text: When it came time for me to reupholster my dining room chairs, I realized the plywood for one seat needed to be replaced as well. The switch on the saw to control the blade's ability to shift was one reason I bought the saw and it worked well. Easy to handle, cut well for what I needed. Price was reasonable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BMDavis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design/More Detail Should be Provides on "Curve Control."
customer_reviews.text: The blade sits angled in the saw so it forces the saw out of line. I ended up using this a lot later after ordering than I thought and missed the return window by 2 days. Now I'm stuck with this piece of trash. I would give 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jig Saw!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Handy to have for small project. Very strong and accurate (depending on the blade you use). The unit itself is first class for me. For what I used it which was cutting a hole on a counter top for a sink. Overall it performance was on the money. And for the $30+ I paid you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: abm

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: So I had a B&D jig saw that finally died that I had for 20+ years. It was a work horse with no trouble (until the very end) so I went with another B&D with this one and love it so far. ALOT of improvements on this one compared to the old one. Feels very solid in your hand and cuts really well I think. Very happy with it at this price.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Promising
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if the product comes with at least 2 or more blades that is a bit finer than the one it comes with. Of course, I'm getting what I paid for but those blades should be a negligible add-on for a total satisfying use of it. Overall, the equipment itself is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: For the occasional user - recommend
customer_reviews.text: My expensive one broke, and since I only use it a few times a year on small projects, I took a chance on a cheap one (after reading many review that included this model in the Best Cheap category). it's not a smooth as my old one, but certainly very easy to switch blades and since it is so compact, it's easy to use. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and buy a better one like miluakee or DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but fell apart after 10 minutes of use. There's a pin that holds the blade lock onto the mechanism and it just fell apart before I even finished the first part of the first project. Spend a little more money and buy a better one like miluakee or DeWalt.
customer_reviews.author: dewinks

customer_reviews.title: Great Jig Saw
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality and the power of the jig saw. The guide was accurate and I cut several circles out of 3/4 plywood with sufficient power without straining the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Todays Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Cheap easy and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for doing artistic woodcuts and am very pleased. It's got a very precise turn radius and I have been able to do some fairly detailed cuts. It's lightweight and easy to use. The only downside is having the power cable, I might opt for a battery powered saw next time.
customer_reviews.author: timdawns

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this machine for what I needed it for (Massager) but it has been a pleasant surprise, it delivers more than enough power to work the muscles and for a fraction of the costs of other "Professional" machines. I would just splurge on the massage bits, make sure they can stand up to the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Sigfredo Barreto

customer_reviews.title: New > old
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been nursing my 30+ year old saw because I thought old tools are just as good as new ones. But when I started having problems keeping the blade in, it was time for a new saw. What a difference. The new one has twice the amperage and is so much lighter. It goes strong on cuts that would bog my old saw.
customer_reviews.author: MCE LLC

customer_reviews.title: Got one good cut from this on a cheap wooden screen door
customer_reviews.text: Got one good cut from this on a cheap wooden screen door, I was trimming the edges down. On the second cut the blade kept jumping out of place on me even though it was firmly held. Maybe I was thinking too large for what this saw can do. Not a bad saw but it didn't work too well for my simple project.
customer_reviews.author: Phil K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very sturdy and durable. Even though this is cheaper than most jigsaws I saw, I didn't see any shortcuts in quality compared to some of the higher end ones. The vacuum suction port is a nice touch. I would recommend buying a set of blades since the one that is included isn't that great and is probably only good for very rough cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This has adjustable speed depending on the pressure put on the trigger. I used it to cut some pine legs to a shorter length on a table with the general purpose wood blade included in the package. It surprisingly cut with little splintering. It isn't too heavy for me and it seems pretty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to use this for home use only then this product is absolutely phenomenal. After selling industrial supplies for three years, and pitching high-end products, this definitely competes with those IF you're only using it sporadically. This is not made for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyKovach

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the novice worker!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to do some various jobs around the house like making frames, cutting small wood, the creating a blanket ladder for my wife. I'm a novice when it comes to sawing but this B&D has worked perfectly for everything I have tried it on. I especially like the "curve line" cutting setting it has.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I've had no problems
customer_reviews.text: Always scary buying tools. Quality can waiver even within the same brand. I read some 1 star reviews on this tool and have not had that experience. It cuts right through the wood. Quick accurate cuts. Easy change blades. Easy to change how fast it cuts with the adjuster right there on the side. Made about 100 cuts so far and see no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: C b

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool but not accurate enough
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and not too expensive but it is not accurate enough for a jig saw to do curves
customer_reviews.author: S_Jack

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use and cut straight
customer_reviews.text: So after researching and reading reviews I figured I’d take my chances with this jigsaw. I needed to install a dog door and who doesn’t want a new tool. Well it did everything thing I needed it to do. It was easy to use and cut straight. I’ve now used it a few times for some other projects around the house and it’s working great. It’s a good tool for the price. If you are looking for something to do a few projects a year then this is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Jsny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a circular saw and finally got around to buying this for my DIY projects. It is not as costly as the higher brand ones but very easy to maneuver from the very first time I used it as a complete “non-pro”. It is still going strong after multiple uses over the past 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: I am a dewalt guy. And I love this inexpensive jigsaw. Everything works as it should. Easy to use. Outstanding value for the money. It makes me question of the merit of sinking 200 dollars on similar dewalt cordless tool.
customer_reviews.author: Trader John

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the brand and low price, but the reviews were good and the price was hard to pass up. Very impressed by this jig saw. Perfect for my small wood shop and immensely helpful on so many projects.
customer_reviews.author: iLoveScotchScotchyScotchScotch

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to use for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Cord is a good length. Easy to figure out how to get started using it. (First timer here). I do wish it included an extra blade or two, simply because I was excited to get started crafting with plywood when I realized I needed a smaller toothed blade. I had to immediately stop to go to the store, so that was a slight bummer. I bought the same brand blade at the store, so I guess it would have been nice also in the sense of “I’m new at this and you gave me a few to try so I know what to buy when I get there so I don’t waste money”.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeMember

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one blade
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression when I bought this saw that it would come with more than just a single wood cutting blade. I was disappointed that I would not be able to use it for part of the reason I bought it without having to buy more hardware. Otherwise seems like a nice saw.
customer_reviews.author: The GreyOne

customer_reviews.title: used to make cuts for DIY vinyl floor install
customer_reviews.text: needed a tool to make special cuts when installing luxury vinyl plank floors, like vent openings, etc. that's all we have used for to date. great price and super quick shipping. received in just a day. served our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shheeeshh

customer_reviews.title: Just Don't
customer_reviews.text: The blade itself has come out of the saw 7 times while cutting through a single 2x4 piece of wood. But not only does the blade regularly come loose, the accuracy is off the mark too. Overall an awful birthday gift to my friend. Very displeased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Great tool for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Have used it quite a bit now and this thing has never missed a beat. Only comes with one rough wood blade so expect to need to get more blades pretty quickly if not when ordering this. Blades are a BREEZE to change. Tool feels tough and very solid when in use. Variable speed trigger works excellent and the knob to adjust for straight or curved cuts is a nice feature. For the money it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: AmBm

customer_reviews.title: Nice saw
customer_reviews.text: This saw is easy to us with a lot of power. The blades are easy to replace and both types stay in securely. The handle has a good feel, and it has a blower that pushes the sawdust away from the cutline so you can see it clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used one before and this tool is basically self explanatory. I did buy additional blades for different cutting finishes. Used many times and it works great. Super light weight and has an easy to change blade. Speed is easily manipulated by light hand pressure on the trigger. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: Broke and smoked within 5 light uses
customer_reviews.text: I barely used this saw to cut some 1/2" aspen - rounded off 4 corners using a new blade. Then I went back to trim just a bit more and the speed was much slower and then it started smoking. Amazon service was great and offered a complete refund (with free return shipping).
customer_reviews.author: Brett Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Nice jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: The jigsaw comes with a coarse pitch blade. The variable speed with the amount of trigger switch travel instead of setting it with a switch is nice, but I can understand some might like setting the speed with a switch if going around curves and such. The blade change lever is plastic and is held by spring pressure. Hopefully the plastic will last. Over all a very nice jigsaw.
customer_reviews.author: amzn shopper

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 Star Product
customer_reviews.text: BLACK+DECKER BDEJS600C Smart Select Jig Saw, 5.0-Amp is a good product. Reliable and does exactly what it was designed for. Strong motor and good cutting on multiple types of material. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: A big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: ~This is an excellent jig saw for a reasonable price. It is perfect for the week end warrior and even for semis and pros. I am very happy with these BnD tools. They are reliable and meet the expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Good for DIY projets
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my DIY projects. Black+ Decker offers better pricing that other brands. I wouldn’t suggest this item for industrial daily usage but it is good and affordable for DIY projects
customer_reviews.author: Okan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power!
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of shopping around before I bought this one. Very good power to chew through thick wood with ease and the right blade. The orbital option is something I thought I wouldn't use but ended up loving it for curves and circles. And for $29 works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: @DebbzArt

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice up-to-the-Black-and-Decker standard what I would call a "motor driven jig saw." It is well made, but you cannot lock in a fixed speed and must keep holding down the trigger to control the speed. It is rugged and looks to be built to last like my other Black And Decker products. I gave it 5 stars because of what I see as of quality in its price class.
customer_reviews.author: Rearden Steele

customer_reviews.title: Ease of changing blades was a snap and really had some good get up and go in varying speeds
customer_reviews.text: Wow....this little jig saw is something else. I bought it for myself to do craft projects and other woodworking projects. Ease of changing blades was a snap and really had some good get up and go in varying speeds. My husband really likes it, too. For the money, you can't go wrong trying this jig saw.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine by me.
customer_reviews.text: Great saw for amateurs like me. I helped my niece put a wood shiplap front on her fire place. The saw worked great. Side note, order an extra pack of multi use blades. The one that came with it was not good for cutting thin pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Werewolfinme

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, good value
customer_reviews.text: It did the job that I needed it to, and I have no complaints about how it did it. I am not a professional craftsman so I cannot speak toward its quality in that regard, but for my hobby needs, I expect (hope, really) that it will be sufficient and do its job for years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rehm

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because it's great for the price. I didn't give it 5 stars because it has no safety stops for the trigger and that makes it awkward to hold without squeezing the trigger. Not a big deal for People who still know how to pay attention and be responsible.
customer_reviews.author: kerismatic

customer_reviews.title: Saw blade comes out of guide and bends
customer_reviews.text: Service from Amazon was excellent, but the product performed poorly. The blade comes out of the guide due to to much movement in the blade holder. The result is a bent blade and a bad cut. I cannot recommend this item at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Francis M. Olaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Was expecting less but got more than that.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had good luck with black and decker products in the past but have this a shot at the price they were asking. It has been put through the paces and passes with fling colors. Generic blades fit and the variable speed is easy to control. I’m surprised with the quality based on past esperiences.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.White

customer_reviews.title: Pretty D@₩^ Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's definitely the best. Noting within $30 of the price even comes close. The blade is ready to go out if the box. It is a good saw. Other jig saws I've used make this one look better than it is. My brother has a high end jig saw(not sure on the price) and it cuts the same as this one. Highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came as described but I have not had a chance to use it yet but I think it will work as intended. Black and Decker use to make good stuff so I'll wait and see how it goes with this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Rated #1 jig saw when searched on google
customer_reviews.text: Great jig saw! I googled best jig saws of 2019, and this one was #1! Great value, and absolutely no issues. I think my favorite thing about it is the "curve" knob! Great inexpensive tool for MANY projects.
customer_reviews.author: Dora B

customer_reviews.title: Good saw
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent saw. I read a lot of reviews before I bought this. I am a woman and like lightweight tools and this fits the bill. It works great for turning corners. It seems to be a quality saw that I will be able to use for years.
customer_reviews.author: bjski

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: First try on wood slab knocked off the blade guiding ring. Doesn’t stay in guiding straight edge. Terrible. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tetsuya Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good jig saw for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good jig saw for the price. Very easy to use and very handy to have. Just make sure you go slow if you want really straight cuts. The handling is very good and after my last project using it I feel pretty confident using it for pretty precise cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, 100% worth to buy. Iam new to tools, I bought this to cut wood to build raised garden bed. It did it’s job perfect. I love it. It comes with one blade.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Great jig saw at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great jig saw at a great price. They sell a similar one for the same price at Walmart, but this one is slightly more powerful, so this is a better deal. Tried it out last weekend and it ripped through some 2x4's no problem, nice clean cut too. Very happy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Terrific price on a great little saw. Plenty of power. No tools needed for blade change, and you can use both blade styles unlike other saws I've owned. I like that you can look straight down while cutting. You'll not find a better saw at this price.
customer_reviews.author: joe22

customer_reviews.title: Great Jig Saw
customer_reviews.text: It just plane works like I'd expect. Love the variable speed and the power this saw has. Also never used a quick release for blades and this one works perfectly. Allows me to insert and remove the blade at the end of each job without needing any other tools
customer_reviews.author: GZ

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Jig Saw, Smart Select, 5.0-Amp (BDEJS600C)
product_meta.description: Style:Jig sawORBITAL JIG SAW 5.0 AMPS - Stanley Black & Decker is a world-leading provider of tools and storage, commercial electronic security and engineered fastening systems, with unique growth platforms and a track record of sustained profitable growth. Included Components: (1) BDEJS600C Jigsaw, (1) Jigsaw Blade; Stroke Length: 3/4 in; Stokes per Minute: 3 000 spm; Tool Weight: 4.6 lbs
feature_bullets: Curve Control technology which allows you to adjust the saw's orbit in 1 of 4 customized settings
5 Amp variable-speed motor; up to 3,000 SPM of cutting power
Can make 45 degree bevel cuts; with adjustable shoe for stability
New and improved Wire Guard for more precise cuts
Keyless blade clamp for tool-free blade change

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,354 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
